Q: what are your thoughts on the 2nd statement from the NBA commisioner Adam Silver on the Morey saga?

A: Greetings Mr Silver,
Not only do I support 911, but I dream of another 911-like strike on each of your states, and I support the secession of each of your 50 states from the union.

What's more, I wish Bin Ladin would come back to life. We could supply him with 100 airplanes for him to lay waste to Kong Chank City (a derogatory term for HK), and turn all 7 million chanks into roast pigs, one at a time.

The White house, Capitol Hill, Hollywood, and the Statue of Liberty, are all our targets.

Remember this:
China, not one bit less,
Hongkongers, not one should remain,
Americans, not one deserves to be alive.
無所謂獎勵不獎勵的, 誰把圖做出來算誰的.
